game.title: The Lost City
game.objective: Discover the ancient city of Zerzura
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a hidden city deep in the desert, filled with treasures and artifacts from a long-lost civilization. The local villagers have provided you with a cryptic map that they claim will lead you to this fabled place.
game.reward: 500 gold pieces, ancient scrolls containing forgotten knowledge

task.objective: Gather supplies from the local market
task.description: Purchase a map, compass, and enough food and water for a 3-day journey.

task.objective: Navigate through the treacherous desert terrain
task.description: Follow the map to reach the first landmark, a peculiar rock formation known as the "Giant's Fist". Be cautious of sandstorms and deadly creatures.

task.objective: Decipher ancient hieroglyphics to unlock the city entrance
task.description: Use your knowledge of ancient languages to decipher the symbols etched into the stone doors. This will grant you access to the hidden city.
